item.title: Project: Shiny app for US Rates
item.description: The Shiny app created in this formula aims to be a easy to use monitor to be on top of US Bond market focusing on US Treasury Yields. The app will give a summary for some of the most important curves and indices on the US Treasury market as well as Breakeven Inflation expectations. Shiny app can be found here. Code available on github. Methodology Rates are parsed from US Treasury on a daily basis.
